tit.j: けいはんなプラザホテル
tit.cmt: I am unsure as to why the hotel name is all in capitals as this is not the case with other private institutions.

sen.j: けいはんなプラザホテル（KEIHANNA PLAZA HOTEL）は、関西文化学術研究都市の中核交流施設、けいはんなプラザの宿泊施設。
sen.e: KEIHANNA PLAZA HOTEL is an accommodation facility within KEIHANNA PLAZA which is the central interaction facility of Kansai Science City.
Keihanna Plaza Hotel is an accommodation facility within Keihanna Plaza which is the central intersecting facility of Kansai Science City.
sen.cmt: I am unsure as to why the hotel name is all in capitals as this is not the case with other private institutions.Word choice.
sen.e: Keihanna Plaza Hotel is an accommodation facility within Keihanna Plaza which is the central intersecting facility of Kansai Science City.

sen.j: 当初は都ホテルズリゾーツのけいはんな都ホテルとして運営されていた。
sen.e: It used to be the Keihanna Miyako Hotel as a part of Miyako Hotels & Resorts.
It used to be the Keihanna Miyako Hotel, a part of Miyako Hotels and Resorts.
At first, it was managed as the Keihanna Miyako Hotel, a part of Miyako Hotels and Resorts.
sen.cmt: trans 2 の訳では「当初は」というニュアンスが若干弱いように感じられました。It used to be → At first, it was managed as

sen.j: その後、レストラン部門から撤退、宿泊部門のみでけいはんなプラザホテルとして存続している。
sen.e: Miyako Hotels & Resorts later withdrew itself from the restaurant industry but remained in the accommodation industry, and the accommodation facility is currently operated as KEIHANNA PLAZA HOTEL.
Miyako Hotels and Resorts later withdrew from the restaurant industry but remained in the accommodation industry, and this accommodation facility is currently operated as Keihanna Plaza Hotel.
Miyako Hotels and Resorts later withdrew from the restaurant industry, thus it remains as Keihanna Plaza Hotel with only the accomodation industry.
sen.cmt: 「宿泊部門のみで」の「のみ」が訳漏れと感じられたのですが、trans 2 の訳では挿入が難しかったので、全文変更してみました。
Capitalized as seems to be a proper noun

sen.j: 国立国会図書館 国立国会図書館関西館
sen.e: Kansai-kan of the National Diet Library
Kansai-kan of the National Diet Library
Kansai-kan of the National Diet Library

sen.cmt: Musee' is not English, so it may be advisable to add 'Museum' to the end for clarity.

sen.j: JR祝園駅・近鉄新祝園駅より奈良交通バスで10分程度。
sen.e: Approximately 10 minutes by a Nara Kotsu Bus from JR Housono Station or Kintetsu Shin-Housono Station.
Approximately 10 minutes by Nara Kotsu Bus from JR Housono Station or Kintetsu Shin-Housono Station.
Approximately 10 minutes by Nara Kotsu Bus from JR Hosono Station or Kintetsu Shin-Hosono Station.
